channel.title: [Help] Combat exp gained from guards
channel.description:
Hey, at the moment my NPC's are giving WAY too much exp, u can get 99 attack in a matter of seconds. Just need to know how to change the given exp. Thanks for all help.
(Also, while i'm here for help, i don't suppose anyone might know why that when i make someone a mod in the client.java file, their crown isn't appearing in the server?)

item.title: [Help] Combat exp gained from guards
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

ok, for people who don’t use cheezscape
i think you need to search for:

xprate

then when you found that,
its standing there in a different way
hope this helps

oh yeah, if you want to compile, you must use
run&compile instead of compile,
its the same + the server is running.

item.title: [Help] Combat exp gained from guards
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

lol :rolleyes: ah well, helping more
and more people could’nt hurt.

ok, first find:

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(400
change those numbers after

TotalExp = (double to whatever you want the xp per hit.
greetzzz

Read full topic
